name: Aviation Go
description:
Aviation Go is a 3D Based Game where you basically fly through obstacles with a Helicopter and collect boxes that has rewards that makes it Easier / Harder to fly.
There is 3 playable levels and you unlock them level by level as you play with two modes that are playable (Endurance/Normal).The game is currently a Beta Version and will be updated regularly.

Requirements
Memory/Ram 512mb
Dual Core Processor
Graphics -Mali 400 mp and up
